title: U.S. Pharmacist Vaccine Update
cleaned_text: | | Older Patients With IBD Need Vaccines to Mitigate Higher Pneumonia Risk When it comes to risk of infections, many inflammatory bowel disease patients have a double whammy: They have immune-system impairment, and many of them are on immunosuppressive medications. [Find out](https://www.uspharmacist.com/article/older-patients-with-ibd-need-vaccines-to-mitigate-higher-pneumonia-risk) how much pneumococcal vaccination decreased the risk of pneumonia in the study cohort, which included older military veterans.
